name: Mad Science Lab
description: Escape the lab before the experiment goes wrong!
author: Claude
aiRules: TOXIC SPILLS: 'toxic_spill' floor tiles damage the player over time (1 life per 3 seconds). The hazmat suit provides immunity. If the player must cross toxic areas, place an 'item-hazmat' somewhere reachable before the spill.
RADIATION: 'radiation' floor tiles damage the player over time (1 life per 3 seconds). The hazmat suit provides immunity. Same as toxic spills â€” place 'item-hazmat' if player must cross.
BROKEN GLASS: 'broken-glass' floor tiles damage the player over time (1 life per 4 seconds). The hazmat suit provides immunity.

LASER GRIDS: 'laser_grid' tiles completely block movement â€” the player cannot walk through them at all. To disable ALL laser grids on the map, the player must use a terminal. Place a 'terminal' object tile, plus 'item-tablet' and 'item-battery' somewhere reachable. Using the terminal with both items disables every laser grid on the map.
CHEMICAL DOORS: 'door-chemical' requires a matching colored 'item-chemical' vial to open. Configure lockColor on both door and item. Colors: red, blue, green, yellow, purple.
SECURITY DOORS: 'door-card' requires a matching colored 'item-card' keycard to open. Configure lockColor on both door and card. Colors: red, blue, green, yellow, purple.
HAZMAT SUIT: 'item-hazmat' can be worn (E key) to protect against toxic_spill, radiation, and broken-glass. Place it before any required hazardous areas.
MEDKIT: 'item-medkit' restores 1 life when used. Place these as safety nets in dangerous areas.

LAB LAYOUT: Design realistic laboratory layouts with corridors, experiment rooms, containment areas, server rooms. Use hazards to create puzzle paths where the player must find the right equipment before proceeding.
